header.headertext: AMENDMENTS TO BE MOVED ON REPORT

text.quote: 000: Clause 57, page 57, line 9, leave out paragraph (a)
000: Clause 57, page 57, line 18, leave out subsection (6)
000: Clause 59, lord Lester of Herne Hill gives notice of his intention to oppose the Question that Clause 59 stand part of the Bill.
